generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="zh">
<head>
    <title>第一次试一下 three.js </title>
    <style>canvas { width: 100%; height: 100% }</style>
</head>
<body>
<script src="https://cdn.bootcdn.net/ajax/libs/three.js/100/three.js"></script>
<script>//设置场景
var renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer();
renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
document.body.appendChild(renderer.domElement);
var camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(30, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 1, 500);
camera.position.set(0, 0, 100);
camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
var scene = new THREE.Scene(); //物体

console.log(Math.random(1 - 2));
var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
  color: Math.random() * 0xffffff
});
var geometry = new THREE.BoxBufferGeometry(10, 10, 10);
renderer.render(scene, camera);
var cube = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
scene.add(cube); //动作

var animate = function animate() {
  requestAnimationFrame(animate);
  cube.rotation.x += 0.01;
  cube.rotation.y += 0.01;
  renderer.render(scene, camera);
};

animate();</script>
</body>
</html>
